span.data-emptytext: Carroll County Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value:
Carroll County Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.
This website is in the process of being updated to ensure compliance with Section 504 and 508 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act by using World Wide Web Consortiums (W3C) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0 Level AA . In the interim, website accessibility concerns may be brought to the attention of Jude Raffeinner, <mailto>jfraffei@ccpsd.k12.va.us</mailto>, or call 276-730-3200.

p.span:
Carroll County Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.
This website is in the process of being updated to ensure compliance with Section 504 and 508 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act by using World Wide Web Consortiums (W3C) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0 Level AA . In the interim, website accessibility concerns may be brought to the attention of Jude Raffeinner, jfraffei@ccpsd.k12.va.us, or call 276-730-3200.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
